en.title: Entry
en.finishYellowBall: You can choose soybean only 6. (yellow: 6, green:1)
en.finishGreenBall: You can choose green beans only one. (yellow: 6, green:1)
en.adMessage: It will be applied after finishing AD.

ko.title: 응모
